SlayTheSpireAIMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
SlayTheSpireAIMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

SlayTheSpireAIMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
SlayTheSpireAIMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
SlayTheSpireAIMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

SlayTheSpireAIMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
SlayTheSpireAIMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

SlayTheSpireAIMod:DefaultAttackWithVaria.NAME: Special Strike
SlayTheSpireAIMod:DefaultAttackWithVaria.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !SlayTheSpireAIMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

SlayTheSpireAIMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumb.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
SlayTheSpireAIMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumb.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !SlayTheSpireAIMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
